channel.title: How to change name and cords in magic tab?
channel.description: the title explains it. how do i change the name of the teleports and where they go in the magic tele tab?

item.title: How to change name and cords in magic tab?
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

for a 317 Delta base:

First you need to edit the action button in class: clickingMost.

Look for:

case 4140:

This is the Varrock teleport spell in your normal spellbook. Edit the X and Y coords to your new location.

Then you willl need to edit the name of your new teleport spell.To do so open class: textHandler.
And look for:

1300

This is the quest id for Varrock teleport, if it doesn’t exist yet add it yourself.

c.sendQuest("Varrock", 1300);

Here’s a list of actionbutton id’s.

Normal spellbook:

Varrock: 4140.
Lumbridge: 4143.
Falador: 4146.
Camelot: 4150.
Ardougne: 6004.
Watchtower: 6005.
Trollheim: 29031.
Ape Atol: 72038.

Ancient spellbook:

Paddew: 50235.
Semtisten: 50245.
Kharyrll: 50253.
Lassar: 51005.
Dareeyak: 51013.
Carrallangan: 51023.
Annakarl: 51031.
Ghorp Rock: 51039.

Read full topic
item.source: How to change name and cords in magic tab?
